channel.title: South West Trains JourneyCheck Feeds
channel.description: Check for problems on your route

item.title: Line problem: at Cosham.
item.description: Owing to signalling problems at Cosham trains have to run at reduced speed on London-bound lines.

item.title: Line problem: at Vauxhall.
item.description: Following a problem near the railway at Vauxhall all lines are now open.

item.title: Line problem: between Eastleigh and Fareham.
item.description: Owing to poor weather conditions between Eastleigh and Fareham fewer trains are able to run on all lines.

item.title: Line problem: between Surbiton and Hampton Court.
item.description: Owing to poor weather conditions between Surbiton and Hampton Court all lines are blocked.

item.title: Line problem: between Eastleigh and Romsey.
item.description: Owing to signalling problems between Eastleigh and Romsey all lines are blocked.
